text: “Men,The term used here refers exclusively to males—so also in 1:21, 2:5, 2:14, 2:22, 2:29, 2:37 and 3:12. brothers: It was necessary that this Scripture be fulfilled, which the Holy Spirit spoke before by David's mouthNotice that Peter evidently held to a ‘dictation’ view of Inspiration, the Holy Spirit used David's mouth. concerning Judas, who was guide to those who arrested Jesus;
